sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { fetchUserStudents } from "../services/studentServices" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { TestModule } from "../TestModule" export const Students = ({ user }) => { const [students, setStudents] = useState([]) const [toggle, setToggle] = useState(false) const handleToggle = () => { setToggle(!toggle) } const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchUserStudents(user.id).then((data) => { setStudents(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [user]) // teacher view should be able to view ALL students she creater // parent view should be able to view only the student she syncs with the student code return ( <>

My students

Please click on a name to see your student's information

or add a new student

Add Student
    {students.map((student) => (

  • {student.firstName} {student.lastName}

    Grade: {student.grade.grade}

    • ))}
{toggle ? : null}
) }
